attributes.action: accept the economic realities described in "The Storm " by Vince Cable, and thus take responsibilty for the role he played in this crisis as described within this book. Then issue a public statement  in which he apologises for the mistakes outlined in the book.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: accept that the explanation for the current economic crisis both globally and within the UK has been caused by the factors explained in detail in Vince Cable's book "The Storm " This also proves that the sub prime crisis in the US was a symptom not the cause of the crisis,and Mr Brown in his previous role as Chancellor shares much of the blame for our situation,for reasons fully explained in the book.

rejection.details: Your petition should be a clear call to action. We do not consider the word "accept" as a valid call to action. Please reword your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
